name: NETXP LINUX PAM Configuration: change
description: Monitors changes to PAM (Pluggable Authentication Modules) configuration files in /etc/pam.d/ and related files (/etc/security/limits.conf, /etc/security/limits.d, /etc/security/pam_env.conf, /etc/security/namespace.conf, /etc/security/namespace.d, /etc/security/namespace.init). PAM controls authentication for various applications and services.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "pam" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
